group_1.narration: <Three days remain until Valentine's Day,@and Walnut's has finished a new creation.>
<It has a lustrous, luxurious silhouette,@as though it were made of precious metals.@It's hard to believe it's merely chocolate.>
<This was no mere candy that sat before me—@it was unmistakably a piece of jewelry.>

group_1.textCenter: We had to race to finish it@in time for Valentine's Day, but...
Today, we'll arrange to deliver it@to the girl who commissioned this.

group_1.narration: I'm sure you're exhausted, but good luck!
<But on her lunch break that day,@Manaka was struck with a harsh rebuke.>

group_1.textRight: No...
This chocolate isn't what I'm looking for.

group_1.textLeft: But...@Surely this form can adequately convey your—!

group_1.textRight: No matter how closely candy imitates jewelry,@it'll never be actual jewelry.
Of course, I understand that precious@metals and jewels are a measure of love,
and that there are some people who@show their affection with objects.
But this is chocolate.
No matter how hard you try,@it'll never be something more than candy.
If I were already going through the trouble of@getting a ring, I would get a real one instead.
What made my thoughts turn to chocolate,
is the thought that the truth is always by its side,@precisely because it's within everyone's reach.
Please don't forget that.
Manaka...

group_1.narration: <She was diagnosed with burnout@and sleep deprivation.>
<She woke up shortly after,@but her eyes had lost their fire.>

group_1.textRight: Manaka, take this...@Ria couldn't be here because of work.
Yeah. She said it would help you recover.
Yeah...
Excuse me, please turn the camera off now.

group_1.textLeft: No, it's okay.@This is a part of my effort, too.[chara:303201:cheek_0][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]
I gave this the okay in the first place because@it'd serve as promotion for Walnut's.
The sight of my failure is just as true@as everything else. There's no twisting that.

group_1.textRight: But...
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]Manaka...are you okay?!
You didn't do anything wrong...@You did your best...
You managed to make it this@far despite all the odds!

group_1.textLeft: In the end, we couldn't substitute for something@that was missing in the first place.[chara:800900:cheek_0][chara:800900:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]
It's just like what Ria-senpai told me@when all this began...
If these chocolates are going to be used for a@confession, they need to be made with love!
But we're not the girl who's confessing!
No matter how I try,@it can only ever be chocolate...
It's like a picture hanging on a wall.
A picture frame is worthless@without the contents within.
The only thing we can do@is make the picture frame...

group_1.textCenter: They play a very important role@in complementing the picture.
There are even craftsmen who specialize in them.

group_1.textRight: Wait...that's it.
I couldn't see it before, but the answer has@been right before our eyes since the start.

group_1.narration: <That day, she heeded her father's words.>
<As soon as Manaka heard his answer,@she made her decision...>
<...to turn down the order they'd received@from the young woman on the student council.>
